ing: 1 habanero pepper, seeded and chopped (wear gloves)
des: "Slightly sweet salad dressing can sub as a dip, glaze, or marinade for chicken, seafood, or red meat."
ins: Place the habanero pepper, olive oil, rice vinegar, peanut butter, water, and garlic into a blender, and process until smooth. Add sesame seeds, and pulse once or twice just to mix. Pour into serving bowl.
